name: Stream - Tolbek + Clones Widescreen v.55
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
For Large screen: Use all the windows size for less scrolling.... Now with a Dark flavour ... It's for TOBLEK-like variants sites (many!): Good movies selection and quality Same version in: - Stream - Tolbek + Clones Widescreen [Userstyles World (USw)] AND - Streaming - Tolbek + Clones Widescreen [GreasyforK] Note: The userstyle name came from the first site of this great "family" i saw: Tolbek (CLOSED 06.2020)

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) - ByPass Sites Limitations Some example: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - YouTube: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) - Streaming : Stream - DuckDuckGo - Streaming Helper - TÃ©lÃ©vision: TÃ©lÃ©rama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray Note: Due to Userstyles.org limitation, some of my userstyles are minified (to reduce their size) by this online tool: CSS Minifier But now they are unreadable easily, sorry. You can watch their readable userstyle on Usertyles.World [USw] (or better use it!), because USw have not limit size when you post Many of my Userstyle are published on Userstyles.World [USw] too : Decembre [Userstyles.World [USw] It's a new site with a great accessibility and no limitation in size for the userstyle posted. I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : Decembre - My Favoris [GreasyFork] Just for info (deprecated): â˜… MY â˜… Installed â˜… GM â˜… Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : Decembre Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: in GreasyFork. By example: - USERSTYLES - TABLES Sorter SIMPLE - Flickr - AUTO More Mini Thumbnail in Photo page Some my userstyles are published here too, by example: - Flickr WideScreen - BigONE I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portraitâ˜…Faces > Portraitâ˜…Facesâ˜…Open Minded

additional_info: For other TOBLEK variants: To find them you can use my: Stream - DuckDuckGo - Streaming Helper This userstyle signal all false streaming sites and others bad things around them. Don't lost your time with them.... NEW 2023.04 You can test too: Stream - Tolbek + Clones Widescreen + TMDB This is an userstyle companion (you need install with this one...) for the userscript: Remplacer div par card et ajouter posters sur les site de streaming [Userscript Greasyfork] This userscript add the info and the movie poster for the movie from the API The Movie Database [aka TMBD]. Note: Here i show the screenshot is with it enable... Last CHANGE : v.53: ADD Many new sites v..52: small corrections in Player etc... v.51: Icon ðŸš§ for "Site Devient....Chercher dans Blog ...". Hover to see the message... v.50: wide player and different presentation [RE Enable] (nfo for download HDLS/ m3u8) : 22.10.2022: Now, they change the way to serve their movies: - they use HDLS / m3u8, which can't be downloaded with "FlashGot" or "Easy Video Downloader" as before So to download a movie here, you need now: The Stream Detector, by rowrawer: Click its icon to open its menu which present video link found. Copy the real link of the video. And in Youtube-dlG - Fork of youtube-dl, with infterface GUI [Korben Blog in french] Here the direct link to the app: youtube-dl-gui [a GitHub Project] Other alternative(I test / use it): Tartube - The Easy Way To Watch And Download Videos: YouTube, BitChute, and hundreds of other websites It's in it you paste this URL of the video to download it.... Example of these link (.m3u8): http://168.119.116.79/hls/7c5e88436f69ae7ab64cd89666282a65/7c5e88436f69ae7ab64cd89666282a65.m3u8 I think it is possible too to rename the movie title before start downloading - not tested no... And download! But now (22.10.2022) i don't need to covert them after! So the info above are just for .... info :-) Another Problem: The downloaded movie, as far i have the only good method, can't be play in VLC (but work in the Media Player of Windows...). So, hmmmf, we need to convert them, with a tool like: Any Video Converter Freeware and convert it to another format. Yet, i use to convert a Custom Format i created. Customized MP4 Movie (*.mp4): VIDEO: Codec Video: X264 Debit Video: 1024 Taux Frame: 25 Aspect Video: Auto Encode Pass: 1 AUDIO: Codec Audio: aac Bitrate audio: 128 Taux Echantillonnage: 44100 Canal audio: 2 It work well: After conversion , i can play the movie in VLC. Not possible now (22.10.2022) stay here just for infos: They return to the "old" way to serve their movies: Now it's more simple to download them. Just use an addon like: - FlashGot (i use it with Waterfox by example) Or (not used by me): - Easy Video Downloader (Flash and Video) Some Bad reviews - Easy Youtube Video Downloader Express (Some Bad reviews, Pay Wall, etc... not tested) Other interesting way to view the video on your TV: the "screen mirroring " or "Smart view " of your Android engine: Comment utiliser la fonction screen mirroring du Chromecast More infos : - youtube-dl: Get the videos you want to keep [Reddit] - Comment utiliser et maitriser Youtube-dl pour tÃ©lÃ©charger des vidÃ©os comme un champion ? - youtube-dl - README [GitHub] - youtube-dl-gui [GitHub] - The Stream Detector [Firefox addon]
